meanings.definition: A spicy condiment made from fruits or vegetables, typically served with Indian cuisine.
meanings.sent1: I love to add a dollop of chutnee to my curry for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The mango chutnee perfectly complemented the samosas.
meanings.sent3: The chutnee danced on my taste buds, making the meal more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of chutnee, adding spice to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The chutnee was so delicious, it lingered on my palate long after the meal.

meanings.sent1: She will chutnee the condiment for the party tonight.
meanings.sent2: I chutneed the chutney onto the plate with care.
meanings.sent3: He chutnees with precision, ensuring the perfect balance of flavors.
meanings.sent4: The chef chutneed the chutney like an artist creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Chutney chutneed onto the dish, enhancing its taste instantly.
